item.title: CoreWeave 冷却的股价反弹面临更大障碍
item.description: CoreWeave 公司（CoreWeave Inc.【原文：CoreWeave Inc.’s blistering rally has lost steam as the artificial intelligence infrastructure play faces a growing tangle of bearish catalysts that threaten to further unravel its meteoric rise.】

item.title: 人工智能生成的虐待儿童网页激增 400%，令监督机构感到震惊
item.description: 根据英国非营利组织互联网观察基金会（Internet Watch Foundation）的最新数据，利用人工智能工具制作的儿童性虐待图像报告在 2025 年上半年激增了 400%。【原文：Reports of child sexual abuse imagery created using artificial intelligence tools have surged 400% in the first half of 2025 according to new data from the UK-based nonprofit Internet Watch Foundation.】

item.title: 美国申请失业救济人数在七月四日假期期间连续四周下降
item.description: 在包括独立日假期在内的这段时间里，美国失业救济金申请连续第四周下降，降至两个月以来的最低点。【原文：Applications for US unemployment benefits fell for a fourth week to the lowest in two months during a period that included the Independence Day holiday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收 50%关税，巴西资产下跌，前景堪忧
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁要对来自南美国家的所有商品征收 50%的关税，这在市场上引起了轩然大波，巴西资产随之下跌。【原文：Brazilian assets dropped as President Donald Trump’s threat to impose 50% tariffs on all goods from the South American nation rippled through markets.】

item.title: 欧盟市场监督机构就加密货币监管问题批评马耳他
item.description: 欧洲市场监管机构批评了马耳他的加密货币监管工作，该机构今年已向几家大型交易所发放了许可证，但在与其授权的一家身份不明的实体有关的几个方面存在不足。【原文：Europe’s markets regulator criticized crypto oversight in Malta, which has granted licenses to several large exchanges this year, for falling short in several areas related to an unidentified entity it authorized.】

item.title: 高盛警告美元可能很快再次像风险货币一样交易
item.description: 最近几周，美元的波动可能已经平息，但高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：US dollar volatility may have settled down in recent weeks, but analysts at Goldman Sachs Group Inc. see plenty of reasons to think it may start trading as a “riskier” currency again.】

item.title: 巴西通胀率上升，连续六个月未达目标
item.description: 巴西的年度通胀率进一步超过目标，这预示着巴西央行在开始放松过高的利率之前还有很长的路要走。【原文：Brazil’s annual inflation ticked up further above target, a signal of the long road ahead before the central bank can begin easing sky-high interest rates.】

item.title: 太阳能发电量创历史新高，法国电价出现负增长
item.description: 周四，法国成千上万块太阳能电池板的发电量创下新纪录，由于电网充斥着廉价电力，发电价格跌破零。【原文：France’s power generation from thousands of solar panels hit a fresh record on Thursday, sending prices below zero as the grid gets flooded with cheap electricity.】

item.title: 五角大楼投资稀土磁铁生产商支持新建工厂
item.description: 稀土磁铁生产商 MP Materials 公司获得了美国国防部 4 亿美元的股权投资，用于建设一座新工厂，摩根大通公司和高盛集团也承诺提供 10 亿美元的融资。股价飙升。【原文：Rare earth magnet producer MP Materials Corp. secured a $400 million equity investment from the US Department of Defense to build a new plant, with a $1 billion financing commitment from JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Goldman Sachs Group Inc. The shares soared.】

item.title: 彭斯指责特朗普转向 "永久性 "关税壁垒
item.description: 前副总统迈克-彭斯批评唐纳德-特朗普的关税议程，称这是与其第一任期截然不同的贸易方式，将损害美国消费者和企业。【原文：Former Vice President Mike Pence criticized Donald Trump’s tariff agenda, saying it was a starkly different approach to trade from his first term that would harm American consumers and businesses.】

item.title: 投票前抢购美元未能提振阿根廷比索
item.description: 由于大豆出口商在出售收获的大豆后兑换了创纪录的美元，比索交易商本以为阿根廷货币会走强。但事实恰恰相反：比索兑美元汇率自 4 月份以来一直走低，现在又下跌了 4%。【原文：Peso traders were expecting the Argentine currency to strengthen as soybean exporters exchanged record amounts of dollars after selling their harvest. Instead, the opposite happened: The peso, which has been weakening against the US currency since April, slid another 4%.】

item.title: 台湾人寿保险公司因新规定而利润增加
item.description: 台湾最大的保险公司在监管机构出台新规定，允许公司动用额外储备金来抵消本币收益带来的亏空之后，于 6 月份实现了盈利。【原文：Taiwan’s biggest insurers posted profits in June after the regulator rolled out new rules to allow companies to access extra reserves to offset shortfalls from gains in the local currency.】

item.title: 即使在特朗普征收关税之前，铜的成本也在攀升
item.description:
由于买家在征税前囤货，纽约期货价格较伦敦价格大幅升水。【原文：

New York futures have been trading at significant premiums to London prices as buyers stock up before the levies.

】

item.title: 欧佩克+讨论在下次增产后暂停增产
item.description: 据熟悉内情的代表透露，欧佩克+正在讨论在下一次月度增产后，从 10 月份起暂停进一步增产。【原文：OPEC+ is discussing a pause in further production increases from October after its next monthly hike, according to delegates familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 国债在30年期债券销售和每周就业数据公布前下滑
item.description: 在出售 30 年期债券以及可能为美联储未来降息提供线索的就业数据公布之前，国债走低，缩减了五周以来的最大涨幅。【原文：Treasuries edged lower, paring the biggest rally in five weeks ahead of a sale of 30-year bonds and jobs data that may provide clues on future interest rate cuts by the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 英国逮捕与 M&S、哈罗德百货网络攻击有关的四人
item.description: 今年早些时候，英国主要零售商遭到了一系列破坏性网络攻击，英国国家犯罪署为此逮捕了四人。【原文：The UK’s National Crime Agency has arrested four people over a series of disruptive cyberattacks that targeted leading British retailers earlier this year.】

item.title: 雅卡里诺退出 X 公司，马斯克找人灭火
item.description: 欢迎收看 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日通讯。今天，库尔特-瓦格纳（Kurt Wagner）将报道琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）辞去社交媒体平台 X 首席执行官一职的消息。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Kurt Wagner reports on Linda Yaccarino’s resignation as chief executive officer of the social media platform X.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁巴西扩大关税攻势
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普本周发给美国贸易伙伴的一系列格式信函中，有一封与众不同。【原文：In the flurry of form letters President Donald Trump sent to US trading partners this week, one stands apart.】

item.title: 英国正努力摆脱债券守夜人的影响
item.description: 我是克雷格-斯特林（Craig Stirling），法兰克福资深编辑。今天我们将探讨英国在公共财政方面如何比其他国家面临更多的金融市场审查。请将反馈和建议发送至 ecodaily@bloomberg.net。如果您还没有注册，请点击这里。【原文：I’m Craig Stirling, a senior editor in Frankfurt. Today we’re looking at how the UK faces more financial-market scrutiny than its peers on public finances. Send us feedback and tips to ecodaily@bloomberg.net. And if you aren’t yet signed up to receive this newsletter, you can do so here.】

item.title: 冰沙王连锁店向 Main Post Partners 出售少数股权
item.description: 据一份声明称，总部位于达拉斯的餐饮连锁店 Smoothie King 向消费者投资者 Main Post Partners 出售了少数股份。【原文：Smoothie King, the Dallas-based restaurant chain, sold a minority stake to consumer investor Main Post Partners, according to a statement.】

item.title: 雅卡里诺退出 X 公司让马斯克避开广告，专注于人工智能
item.description: 琳达-雅卡里诺（Linda Yaccarino）辞去 X 平台首席执行官一职之前，她曾为赢得对该平台在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）掌控下的发展方向感到失望的广告商的青睐而进行了长期而有争议的努力。【原文：Linda Yaccarino’s exit as chief executive officer of X follows a long and contentious effort to win over advertisers dismayed by the platform’s direction under Elon Musk’s ownership.】

item.title: 据称 Mitratel 将考虑重启价值 55 亿美元的 Bersama 合并案
item.description: 印尼电信塔公司 PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi 正在考虑恢复与竞争对手 PT Tower Bersama Infrastructure 的合并，熟悉此事的人士称，这将是该公司十年来第二次尝试合并。【原文：Indonesian telecommunications tower company PT Dayamitra Telekomunikasi is considering reviving a merger with rival PT Tower Bersama Infrastructure, people familiar with the matter said, which would mark the second such attempt in a decade.】

item.title: 在预算压力下，美国高级将领在首尔会见同行
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统就国防开支和贸易问题向其亚洲盟友施加更大压力之际，美国最高级别的军官访问首尔，与韩国和日本同行举行会谈。【原文：The highest-ranking military officer of the US visited Seoul for talks with his South Korean and Japanese counterparts as President Donald Trump ratchets up pressure on his Asian allies over defense spending and trade.】

item.title: 沙特王室经营着价值 2500 亿美元的公司，为巨额交易创造条件
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯斥资数万亿美元重塑经济的同时，一个由王储弟弟监管的鲜为人知的投资集团正在成为关键的权力掮客。【原文：As Saudi Arabia spends trillions of dollars to reshape its economy, a little-known investment group overseen by the crown prince’s brother is emerging as a key power broker.】

item.title: 客户大举采购 IT 后，TCS 盈利超出预期
item.description: 塔塔咨询服务有限公司（Tata Consultancy Services Ltd.）公布的季度收益超过了分析师的预期，表明全球企业的技术支出正在复苏。【原文：Tata Consultancy Services Ltd. reported quarterly earnings that exceeded analysts’ estimates, signaling a revival in tech spending by global enterprises.】

item.title: 收购巨头为何互相投资对方的交易
item.description: 公开募股渠道的萎缩和交易荒的持续，让私募股权公司不得不把眼光放得更小一些。【原文：A sputtering public offering pipeline and lingering dealmaking drought has private equity firms thinking a little smaller.】

item.title: 如今，ETF 投资者无法获得足够的现金
item.description:
专注于国库券的贝莱德基金资产超过 500 亿美元

BlackRock fund focused on Treasury bills surpasses $50 billion in assets

】

item.title: 塞尔维亚再次维持利率不变，价格风险大于增长风险
item.description: 塞尔维亚连续第十个月维持借贷成本不变，即使在通胀率向巴尔干国家的目标迈进以及经济扩张在全球贸易风险和国内政治抗议活动的影响下放缓之后，仍保持了谨慎的立场。【原文：Serbia left borrowing costs unchanged for a 10th month, keeping a cautious stance even after inflation inched toward the Balkan nation’s target and economic expansion slowed amid global trade risks and political protests at home.】

item.title: 特朗普的削减使联邦数据消失
item.description:
从诊断疾病到计算保险赔付，专业人士使用的在线工具正在走向黑暗。【原文：

Online tools that professionals use for everything from diagnosing diseases to calculating insurance payouts are going dark.

】

item.title: 欧盟卡拉斯与以色列达成向加沙提供援助的协议
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，欧盟和以色列已达成协议，允许向加沙提供更多援助，未来几天每天的供应量将大幅增加。【原文：The European Union and Israel have reached an agreement to allow more aid to Gaza, with a substantial increase of daily supplies to happen in the coming days, according to a person familiar with the matter.】
